channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 10 Years After the Supreme Court Legalized Same-Sex Marriage Nationwide, Here’s What Couples Think

item.title: Tanner Martin Announces His Own Death
item.description: Tanner Martin has documented his fight against colon cancer for hundreds of thousands of followers. His death was announced in a recorded video.

item.title: RFK Jr.’s New Advisers Rescind Recommendations for Some Flu Vaccines
item.description: Panelists pulled back some endorsements for certain vaccines containing a preservative that critics have falsely linked to autism.

item.title: Debris From SpaceX Explosion, Landing in Mexico, Draws Investigation
item.description: Mexican environmental activists say detritus raining down from Elon Musk’s rocket company has caused die-offs of marine life.
